MainInstructionText.heading: Fraud Risk Awareness and Prevention Assessment
MainInstructionText.para: Fraud is a universal problem, and no country and economy is emmune from it. They financial losses and significant and as employee of Standard Charterd, it is your role to remain vigilent and do the right thing to reduce the risk of fraud-Spot,Stop,Report.
This course will equip you with the knowledge to detect the most common types of external and internal fraud scheme.
Select the START button to begin the course.

mcq.retryText: Select the "Try again" option to resume the evaluation.
mcq.noteText: Note: Do not print this certificate for general record keeping, save it as a PDF instead. Reducing the amount of printing we do helps us reduce our enviromental impact. We wanr to do your bit.
mcq.scorePassText:
Well dome you correctly answered 8 of 10 question and have scored 80%. You have passed the assessent and have succesfully complete the module.

Below is a dashboard showing your score for each topic. Ro ensure you have the nessary knowledge and understanding of the concepts covered in this course, we recommened you revisit any topics highlighted in red as part of your development
mcq.scoreFailText:
Try Again! you correctly answered 5 of 10 question and have scored 50%. Yo pass the assessment, you need to answer at least 8 questions correctly.

Below is a breakdown of your score for each topin. As you scored 80%, we recommend you review the necessary topic areas before proceeding to take the post-module asssessment again

failText.node: Yoy can revisit the topic areas by clicking the Menu button
If you do not wish to review topic areas, select Retake Assessment to attempt the module assessment again,

passText.node: Yoy can module using Menu button or you can exit the module using the Exit button
Select View Certificate to collect your certificate.
